Room.Name: Necropolis Avenue/Lelion Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Lelion Way and Necropolis Avenue.
Room.LongDescription: Necropolis Avenue runs south from Lelion Way, which heads east to west. On the north side of the road is the Lyanden Swamp where various hideous creatures dwell. Necropolis Avenue heads south past the Harvest Circle, directly into the Main Entrance of the Necropolis.
